title: Add "schema-browser" tab support to AngularJS Admin UI

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: Upayavira Would you do me a favor and add a comment when you upload a patch indicating whether you think it's ready to commit or not? I don't want to commit something that I shouldn't.

comments.author: Upayavira
comments.content:
you can assume it is ready to commit, if I upload it here 

There's only the segments UI to do, then all tabs are done, and we are on to QA work and filling in anything I've missed.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: Upayavira I can't apply that patch to trunk or 5x, could I ask you to update the source, regenerate it and I'll try again? I get lots of conflicts that I haven't a clue how to deal with.

comments.author: Upayavira
comments.content: apply the dataimport tab first, I bet it will apply after that nicely.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content:
Ahhh, 7396 slipped under my radar, just assigned it to myself.

I'll get both, thanks!
